Unknow Bot:: 

"AAAAAGGGHHHHHHH!!!!" the male screamed in pain while his body was 
severy hurted, he fell in stasis, whiloe his spark started to blink 
and menaced to fade

The cargo bay lay close by as the CR chambers inside reeched and four 
soldiers emerged growling, snarling and screeching. Mirage lay close 
by having landed outside the ship his leg was ripped apart, but he 
was alive... 
  
Unknow BOt: 
  
The male was bleeding and his spark menaced to fade 

The four soldiers walked out and looked around, one transformed and 
flew around screeching, the tallest of the four picked up mirage 
while the last two began tearing there way into the cockpit... 
 
Unkow bot:

The young male woke up and  said "Help... me" he felt uncounceus 
aagain 

Slag and snarl pulled the bot up and carried him to the the 
other. "What we do now?" Asked Sludge. "Grimlock King he give 
orders." Slag replied. Swoop crcled over head. "No see, no see." 
Snarl growled. "GrimLock King we wait." 
*********** 
GrimLock looked up his body twisted and burned. He stood, all of his 
armor was gone, and his bot form was striped clean to his 
exoskeleton, He dragged the object he landed on and walked towards 
the crash... 
  
Unknow BOt 
  
"C... R"said the bot who was feeling that he was dying, he lost his 
conceus again Slag transformed into fiddled with his horns. "Me think 
bot want in box?" Sludge picked him up roughly and took the unknown 
bot into the CR chamber and placed mirage next to him. The doors 
closed as the ship prepared them for rpairs and beast forms... 
 
CR: 
 
CR started to work, in case of the young male, but outside it was 
sparking and It seemed that Cr wasn't working all right. The bot 
would be lucky if CR didn't fail before end reparations  
 
Swoop transformed. "What wrong, what wrong?" Slag poked at the 
sparks. just then the devastated Grimlock walked in. "M-M-Me, 
Grim..." He stopped and walked over and puleed open the dorr and 
lifted Mirage out, "What wrong wih Box?" 
 
Mirgae looked hald contious, "I-I'm not S-sure..." He passed out. 
 
Grimlock looked around, Close dorrs, Me Fix." 
 
Snarl blinked. "You Fix?" 
 
Grimlock turned his disfigured face snarling. "You not think me can 
fix?" 
 
Snarl jumped back. "No, You fix, you fix good." 
 
CR 

Cr continued  working on the bot. Now it was scanning and builting a 
beast mode for him and a new body too Grimlock felt his body 
changing, his armor being rplaced, as well as mirage, 
 
and the others. Mirage blinked looking up. " Grimlock... what did you 
d-do?" 
 
Soon the room glowed enough to blind the bots... slowly the cargo 
doors opened, and Grimlock stood in new armor, and a bit 
taller... "GrimLock look funny?!" His bot form was not much different 
except for the fact that instead of claws on each hand he now had 
either the upper or lower jaws of a t-rex, his feet now ended in 
large claws, and he had a tail folded against his 
back,he pulled it off and lifted it, the tail split down the middle 
and a large broad sword sli out. "Grimlock want old sword back." 

Swoop blinked and preened his new scales. "Swoop no missiles?"! Slag 
and snarl looked at each other growling while sludge had wondered off 
to graze... 
 
Mirage was the most changed. "Oh man...." He looked around, he had 
his beast forms head while the rest of him appeared to be robotic 
except for patches of fur. 
 
Quetzalcoatl: 
 
The young bot emerged from Cr in his beast form. It was a sort of 
fuzzor: a pterodactil named by future humans as Quetzalcoatlus with 
the shinning blue-green mettallic feathers of a bird named Quetzal. 
The male crawled using his little paws and his wings. more useful to 
fly. "Are all, All right"  
 
Mirage just shook his head. "I'm a cat?" What am i supposed to do as 
a cat?" 
 
Grimlock Changed and loomed over them as a T-Rex, his scales were 
brown, tan, and black, he looked arounf as slag became the 
triceratops, snarl the stegosaurus, swoops a teradactyl, and sludge 
was busy eating plants near by as a bronto. "Me GrimLock soft and 
ugly?!" 
  
Quetzalcoatl: 
  
"It's nice tha you're a cat, sir"said the bot "That meanst that you 
have seven lifes or nine... We got this organic forms 'cause this 
place has Energon Radiation that could be mortal for us... So"he 
looked his own beast mode"This is the best protection that we can 
have" 
 
GrimLock slamed one large foor down. "Me GrimLock not like soft 
skin." 
 
Mirage looked over at quetzalcoatl. "Oh man this is not cool." 
 
Quetzalcoatl:
 
"It's the only way that we can survive here"said the male "We have to 
use this... or dead"
